DOC.brief_summary: This study do evaluate long-term safety tegaserod woman symptoms dyspepsia complete core study . Tegaserod evaluate 6 mg twice daily .
DOC.brief_title: Extension Study Assess Long-Term Safety Tegaserod Women With Symptoms Dyspepsia
DOC.criteria: Female , 18 year old Fulfilled eligibility criterion CHTF919 D2302 ( double blind study ) successfully complete doubleblind study Early discontinuation doubleblind study Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
